backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing chat logic, user profiles, message storage, and authorization/mixin integration with state maps and CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to include a new theme field while preserving all other stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the themeâ€‘toggle feature, affected frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT-BRANDING-CHECKLIST.m: Checklist document ensuring correct branding assets, titles, and icons before deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH light/dark theme tokens and base UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document metadata, branding icons, and an early script to initialize light/dark theme before React loads.
Node script validating that branding assets and HTML references exist and match required values during deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing stored user profile state and switching between JoinScreen and ChatScreen.
frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI component handling message sending, rendering, profile updates, and displaying settings and header UI.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the custom emoji picker component.
frontend/src/components/GifPicker.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the GIF picker component.
frontend/src/components/JoinScreen.tsx: User join UI handling username entry, optional image upload, error checks, and triggering user creation.
frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx: Renders a chat message with avatar, timestamp formatting, and styling for own vs others' messages.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Dialog for editing username, profile picture, and theme with upload validation and profile update calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state via Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for messages, users, sending messages, profile updates, and picture handling via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines Giphy API config including API key, endpoints, and default params.
frontend/src/lib/theme.ts: Exports the default app theme set to light mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, spacing, animations, and plugins for the UI theme.
project_state.json: Tracks project versioning, requirements, issues, and constraints for restoring Version 35 with a theme toggle.
